title: Massive Trade Union Action this week
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Trade Union Coordinating Center has planned to hold protests in various parts of the country for a week from Monday (9) demanding the resignation of the President and the Government.
The convener of the Trade Union Coordinating Center, Saman Ratnapriya said the country’s crises are escalating day by day due to the government’s inefficient handling of the economy.
This trade union action is expected to cripple the country’s state services.
